com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.instruction

Class InstructionLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.instruction.InstructionLoader

  • public class InstructionLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that can be used to load a given BannerText into the provided TextView.

    For each BannerComponents, either the text or given shield URL will be used (the shield URL taking priority).

    If a shield URL is found, Picasso is used to load the image. Then, once the image is loaded, a new ImageSpan is created and set to the appropriate position of the Spannable/

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context)
        Must be called before loading images.

        Initializes a new Picasso instance as well as the ArrayList of InstructionTarget.

        Parameters:
        context - to init Picasso

      • prefetchImageCache

        public void prefetchImageCache(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.LegStep step)
        Will pre-fetch images for a given LegStep.

        If loaded successfully, this will allow the images to be displayed without delay in the InstructionView.

        Parameters:
        step - providing the image Urls

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()

      • loadInstruction

        public void loadInstruction(android.widget.TextView textView,
                            com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.BannerText bannerText)
        Takes the given components from the BannerText and creates a new Spannable with text / ImageSpans which is loaded into the given TextView.
        Parameters:
        textView - target for the banner text
        bannerText - with components to be extracted
        Since:
        0.9.0
